message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While I'm willing to negotiate, the value of this product to me is quite high.  Could you consider $13,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to offer $12,000 for the product. Would you be able to meet at this price?
